name: have it
description:
The game offers us three elements to choose from - a unique power-up, the ability to take a picture, and a third element - a woman!
The screenshot above shows a few of the five cards before you can make your selection. Then the game unfolds and you choose which of the three heros you wish to be. Up to 3 of the women you meet become playable heroes. Outhouse Media have provided us with a teaser video which you can watch above. The game has been designed to suit both men and women, but it's powerful for those who want to take a break from intense action. Here's hoping the game will make a return on its release. It's scheduled to launch on the PC in March this year.
